description:
a multi model capible nvda add-on to chat with AI models.
this add-on allows you to chat with AI models.
such as: chatGPT, gpt 3.5, microsoft copilot, gemini, gemini 1.5 flash, pro AI and more much.
i am planning to add more AI models in the future versions.
so, use it and support me.
for any requests or suggestions, contact me at sujanrai8448@gmail.com.
to access this add-on, press NVDA+alt+a or go to nvda menu>tools menu and open it.
for more instructions and uses, press help in the add-on.
